result.arabic_text: ٱللَّهُ يَصۡطَفِي مِنَ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ رُسُلٗا وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعُۢ بَصِيرٞ
result.translation: 75.Yalli malaykak isi ambiyâ fanah ruuba farmoytitte doora isi wacyi ken guddussamkeh, kaadu sinaamak farmoytittey Yallih farmó sinam guddussa doora, diggah Yalli isi naqoosah yab yaabbi ken taamoomi yabali.
